input.sentences: the town celebrates st. [male] 's day outside the capitol building .
however | even while celebrating this does not keep people from picking up their cellphones .
fortunately | may families get together and have a good time .
everyone is wearing green and many people have smiles on their faces .
some people even take the time to act a little funny while sticking their tongues out .
output.sentences: There are people in the streets in celebration of a specific event.
There is a woman all in black talking on her phone with paint on her face.
Some of the people are wearing costumes, most of them in very festive hats.
One woman is wearing a green, yellow and blue cape like garment.
It looks like a day of fun and coming together for the same cause.
